name: Infant And Toddler Care
description: Early Head Start program is designed to meet the unique needs of infants and toddlers ages 3 months to 3 years. They offer high quality infant and toddler classrooms, with highly qualified teaching staff, provide loving, nurturing, and responsive environments for the youngest children, in partnership with their families. The services are free or low cost for eligible families. Program details: - Age-appropriate activities individualized for each child - Emerging language and literacy - Sensory a
